translations.messages.generic.player-not-found: &cThat player is not online or doesn't exist.
translations.messages.command.generic.no-permission: &cYou do not have permission to use this command.
translations.messages.friend.error-viewing-request: &cAn error occurred while attempting to view that friend request.
translations.messages.friend.incoming-request-not-fou: &cYou do not have an incoming friend request from &e{%0}&c.
translations.messages.friend.add-friend-limit-reached: &cCannot add friend, you or the other player has reached the maximum amount of friends.
translations.messages.friend.accept-friend-limit-reac: &cCannot accept request, you or the other player has reached the maximum amount of friends.
translations.messages.friend.cannot-add-self: &cYou cannot add yourself as a friend.
translations.messages.friend.request-already-sent: &cYou have already sent a friend request to &e{%0}&c.
translations.messages.friend.too-many-requests: &cYou have too many friend requests, you cannot send any more.
translations.messages.friend.request-sent: &aYou have sent a friend request to &e{%0}&a.
translations.messages.friend.denied-request: &cYou have denied the friend request from &e{%0}&c.
translations.messages.form.generic.invalid-data: &cInvalid data provided, please ensure you fill out all fields in forms.
translations.messages.form.group.add.no-permission: &cYou do not have permission to add &e{%0} &cto &e{%1}&c.
translations.messages.forms.group.add.already-in-grou: Could not add &e{%0} &cto &e{%1}&c, they are already in that group.
translations.messages.form.group.remove.no-permission: &cYou do not have permission to remove &e{%0} &cfrom &e{%1}&c.
translations.messages.forms.group.remove.not-in-group: Could not remove &e{%0} &cfrom &e{%1}&c, they are not in that group.

translations.forms.friend.main.content: Manage your current friends and requests.
